Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product not only serves its intended purpose exceptionally well but also adds a touch of elegance and functionality to your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this product for $200. I'm confident you'll find its value exceeds your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
